titleStmt.title: A speech delivered in the Starr-Chamber, on Wednesday, the XIVth of Iune, MDCXXXVII. at the censure, of Iohn Bastwick, Henry Burton, & William Prinn; concerning pretended innovations in the Church. By the most Reverend Father in God, VVilliam, L. Archbishop of Canterbury his Grace.
titleStmt.author: Laud, William, 1573-1645.
England and Wales. Court of Star Chamber.

titleStmt.title: A speech delivered in the Starr-Chamber, on Wednesday, the XIVth of Iune, MDCXXXVII. at the censure, of Iohn Bastwick, Henry Burton, & William Prinn; concerning pretended innovations in the Church. By the most Reverend Father in God, VVilliam, L. Archbishop of Canterbury his Grace.
titleStmt.author: Laud, William, 1573-1645.
England and Wales. Court of Star Chamber.

notesStmt.note: The words "Iohn Bastwick .. Prinn;" are bracketed together on title page.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
"The sheets, formes, and even pages of this ed[ition]. were set from 1 to 4 times and occur in all possible combinations"--STC.
This edition has an ornament with crown, rose, and thistle on the title page.
Identified as STC 15306-07 on UMI microfilm reel 673.

Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery ("Early English books, 1475-1640"), and the British Library ("Early English newspapers").
Appears at reel 673 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy) and at reel 1353 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy).
